title:
I heard there are alligators in the intracoastal waterway (carolina beach up to surf city).

Are there any?  How big do they get?  Is it safe to swim in it?
text:
Alligators are native species here.

Here are a couple of links with more information:

http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3339
